msbt.message: This may sound strange, but does the horseshoe crab give off a retro vibe to you too? Huh
If the sea pineapple isn't related to shellfish or coralthen what is it?Oooh! This sounds like it could be the beginning of an underwater mystery novel, .
Wow! Take a look at those massive claws, !I wonder if acute shoulder pain is a common affliction for lobsters
It can't be easy to be as happy as THIS clam. But I'm more than up for the challenge, !
The umbrella octopus is simply adorable, .Though I doubt it'd provide much protection from the rain.
I heard the red king crab had fewer legs than other crabs, but the limbs it does have are pretty substantial.
There's something so soothing about watching a moon jellyfish in motion.The natural world holds so much beauty, doesn't it?
So the chambered nautilus can float even though it has a shell?Maybe it's hiding a state-of-the-art buoyancy system behind that hard, yet elegant exterior
The spider crab is huge! I would not want to run into one of these guys on a night dive. No way, no how
This giant isopod reminds me of something I've seen on land.It's like I'm looking at another creature up closeand underwater.
Weren't you the one who donated this creature to the museum? Thank you so much for doing that! You learn so much more about these creatures when you can see them up close, .
